oligoelement.name: Iron
oligoelement.description: Essential for transporting oxygen in the blood.

oligoelement.name: Zinc
oligoelement.description: Important for growth and development, immune system, and wound healing.

oligoelement.name: Copper
oligoelement.description: Necessary for the formation of red blood cells, nervous and immune system health.

oligoelement.name: Manganese
oligoelement.description: Participates in nutrient metabolism and formation of connective tissues.

oligoelement.name: Iodine
oligoelement.description: Essential for the production of thyroid hormones that regulate metabolism.
